definition: remedy that prevents or slows the course of an illness or disease, preventing or contributing to the prevention of disease
details:
noun
- remedy that prevents or slows the course of an illness or disease
= example: remedy that prevents or slows the course of an illness or disease
= synonyms: prophylactic, preventive
- an agent or device intended to prevent conception
= synonyms: preventive
- any obstruction that impedes or is burdensome
= synonyms: hitch
adjective
- preventing or contributing to the prevention of disease
= synonyms: prophylactic
- tending to prevent or hinder
= synonyms: preventive
